## hpr1412 :: ohmroep hpr live 2, 31-06-2013, advancing local communities

 
Nido Media reporting Hacker Public Radio Live. Starring Cecile Langhorst
as co-host who saves the show, and two guests. Civardi from Rhizomatica,
who is active in installing GSM networks in rural areas in Mexico tells
us of his experiences with GSM technologies and Mexican villagers.
Bicycle Mark relates about his work training people from war or post-war
countries to become reporters.
